name: Space for Pause
description:
This is a game for Major Studio Week 2 Jam The prompt is "One Button Game" Control:

Space - pause / player video , start / restart game

Rule:

If you don't pause your video when your boss passing by, boss gets mad.

If you don't watch your video when you at work, you feel sad.

(That's just toxic working culture)

Anyway, try to manage between happiness and employment.

Hope you enjoy it.

Music:

Happy tree friends (Theme) - Various Artist

Version:

1.0 (9/23)

2.0 (9/23 )

- Changed the background color
